REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0115 reute h f BC-PRIMAGE-<PRIM>-INTROD 03-11 0057

TEXT.TITLE: PRIMAGE <PRIM> INTRODUCES NEW PRINTER
TEXT.BODY: Primages Inc said it introduced a new daisywheel printer that can print 90 characters per second and features graphics capabilities. The printer, called Primage 90-GT, is priced at 1,500 dlrs and can be combined with the company's paper-handling systems, Primage said. Reuter
